metadata.name: Blood is frozen and eye has no tear
metadata.description:
A collaboration with a very talented Brazilian artist who worked on video's sound - Lil Terror


"Uncertainty"

There is inside your heart
a bitter, brutal death,
a place of deep upset
where the lyre cannot breathe.

Once a boiling fire,
now your blood is frozen.
And your eye has no tear,
your heart — no compassion.

And when asked: “What occurred,
what does your heart yearn for?”
He raises his arms skyward
yet gives to men no answer.

poem by Galaktion Tabidze who was a major Georgian poet in the early 20th century
